pictures.heading: Symbaloo
pictures.text: Symbaloo is a platform which helps you manage bookmarks. They are located in Delft. I mainly worked on their gamification project and account reorganisation. I had a great year working there, learned a lot of new stuff and met some awesome colleagues!
pictures.codes: HTML, SASS, CSS, Javascript, Elm, GraphQL
pictures.tools: Illustrator, Photo Shop, VsCode, Mysql Workbench

pictures.heading: Octo
pictures.text: I Started working at Octo as a freelance developer to create their first website. I have worked there for a year and created the design, front-end and back-end for the website. Now a few years later they turned into to Spotr.ai. Watch the video to see what I built for them.
pictures.tools: Wordpress, Illustrator, Photo Shop, Figma, VPS

pictures.heading: waarderuil
pictures.text: Waarderuil.nl is one of my personal projects. The goal is to create a platform that makes it easy for people to find and trade the right stuff so we can make this planet and it's resources more sustainable.

pictures.heading: Zenchi Records
pictures.text: I'm creating a website for a music making company called Zenchi Records. I have coded the application in nextjs and runs on AWS amplify

pictures.heading: Spin a movie
pictures.text: Spin a movie is a website where you go when you don't know what to watch. Currently you can only search movies by keyword. My plans are to create an AI that will pick a movie for you to watch based on selected preferences.
pictures.codes: HTML, CSS, nextjs, react, Rest API

pictures.heading: Rumah-Afra
pictures.text: Rumah Afra is an artist. She is a dancer who likes to write and show her minimalistic lifestyle. Together we have come to a website which expresses exactly who she is.

pictures.heading: Ninetysix Music
pictures.text: Ninetysixmusic is an artist who makes music. Together we have created a really out of the box website to express her image as a musician.

pictures.heading: Woordenschat
pictures.text: OWG is an organisation that creates educational games for children. They asked me to make a game where people could learn a language trough pictures and words

pictures.heading: Belleza Stylist
pictures.tools: Illustrator, Photo Shop, VsCode, Mysql Workbench

pictures.heading: Platysign
pictures.text: Platysign was my own first IT company which i started with some friends i knew from college. We did this for a couple of years but then went our own ways.

pictures.heading: Hoornse
pictures.text: De Hoornse Damper is a store that sells vapes and supplies. I made a website for browsing their products and making a store order.

pictures.heading: Photomaster
pictures.text: Photomaster was a photo competition where people had to send in their best shots to win a prize. Thisis the design I made for them.

pictures.heading: JT Photography
pictures.text: Jonai Tan is a freelance photographer. He asked me to create a portfolio for him where people can find his work. This is the design I made for him

pictures.heading: BNT
pictures.text: B&T Jeans was a small online pants selling company, this is the design I made for them.

pictures.heading: Staggering Design
pictures.text: Staggering Design was a small IT company that delivered IT solutions. This is the website i made for them.
